title: iHealth Unified Care
description:
The iHealth Unified Care platform empowers patients with chronic diseases including Diabetes, Hypertension, obesity etc. to better manage their health and get real-time feedback from their primary care physician and professional care team members. iHealth Unified Care mobile app provides patients with a customized care plan, real-time chatting capabilities with care team members, and bluetooth connected devices such as iHealth Align blood glucose monitor and iHealth BP3L blood pressure monitor for vitals self tracking and sharing data with physicians and care teams in real time.

Main features:
+Real time monitoring and communication with a professional care team
+Take vitals measurements using iHealth Align portable glucometer, iHealth BP3L blood pressure monitor and/or other bluetooth connected devices
+View your vitals data history and trends
+Collaboratively track your meals with registered dietitians via food diaries
+Care teams review your food diary uploads and provide feedback
+View your health information — appointments, care team members, vitals measurement thresholds and schedules, medications, lab test results
